titles: The suruey of popery vvherein the reader may cleerely behold, not onely the originall and daily incrementes of papistrie, with an euident confutation of the same; but also a succinct and profitable enarration of the state of Gods Church from Adam vntill Christs ascension, contained in the first and second part thereof: and throughout the third part poperie is turned vp-side downe.
author: Bell, Thomas, fl. 1593-1610.
publisher: Printed by Valentine Sims dwelling on Adling hill at the signe of the white Swanne,
notes: The first four words on the title page are enclosed in a woodcut frame.
